name: U.F.O. GX
description:
Game Modes

1 Player

Move UFO using your cursor to dodge the asteroids and comets, collecting a Battery will temporary transform the UFO into a rocket that can destroy everything in its path.

  • You can also play using the ◁ ▷ / A-D keys.

2 Players

Both players uses the key boards. Player 1 uses the A-D keys while Player 2 uses ◁ ▷. The player who destroys the highest amount of asteroids before time runs out is the winner.

Color Palettes

You can change the palettes at any time by pressing one of these number keys on your keyboard:

  1. GX (Default)
  2. Code
  3. DMG
  4. Pocket
  5. Light
  6. Winter
  7. Spring
  8. Summer
  9. Autumn
